summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 PONTIAC G6. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE DRIVER'S SIDE HEADLIGHT CONTINUED TO FAIL. THE DEALER (LEE PETERSON MOTORS OF YAKIMA, 410 S 1ST ST, YAKIMA, WA 98901, (509) 731-3946) STATED THAT AN EXTRA PART NEEDED TO BE PURCHASED CONCERNING THE WIRING. THE DEALER WAS UNABLE TO RETRIEVE THE PART. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN.
